messages.subject: Unschooling novelist; OT
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I just wanted to let you all know about an interview I did with a very special unschooling mama who just released her first novel last year (it was
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

I just wanted to let you all know about an interview I did with a very
special unschooling mama who just released her first novel last year
(it was just released in the US on Thursday). The Birth House has been
on several best seller lists in Canada and to celebrate it's release
here, the author set up a "wise women blog tour" of which I am a part.

Stop by my blog today, for some unique inspiration, ala Ami McKay.
She's a really interesting person, fabulous writer and very
inspirational. Today is part I of the interview and tomorrow we should
have part II available.

Pour a cuppa and come visit! http://radicalunschooling.blogspot.com/

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
